attributes.action: Stop the Government thinking the british public are lost sheep and need to be told how to tie their shoe laces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government is increasingly interfering with our way of life.  We are not being given the opportunity to make our own decisions.  Whether we smoke is our choice, whether we recycle is our choice etc etc.  How can the UK start "Green" taxes while Iraq is burning? How much CO2 does war create??  and please stop taxing the tax.  More money for fewer services thats fair eh?

rejection.details: Please provide a specific action for HM Governemnt.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
